Arthur Dent ( Martin Freeman ) is a normal man , who is having a bad day .
After knowing that your home is about to be demolished , Arthur discovers that Ford Prefect ( Mos Def ) , his best friend is an alien and , to complete , learns that the earth is about to be destroyed so that they can build a new hyperspace motorway.
Without having anything to do to prevent the destruction of his planet, Arthur has only one way : piggyback on a spaceship that is passing .
He then goes on to survey the universe , and everything you need to know about your new life is contained in a valuable book .
